name: 51 BAFFES
description:
At the crossroads of a fighting game and a shooting game, 51 BAFFES takes you to the heart of the mysterious Area 51. An alien and a janitor confront each other via telekinetic powers. The first one wants to escape, the second one is just doing his job.

> Genre : Fighting game
> Number of players : 2, local
> Development time : 1 month
> Platform : Windows & Mac
